content.text: 4 large carrots, cut into 1 inch pieces
content.eamr: ( ing-0 "4 large carrots, cut into 1 inch pieces" )

content.text: 0) Place the carrots, onion, vegetable broth and cilantro into a large saucepan.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "Place"@3:8 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "the carrots"@9:20 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-1 "onion"@22:27 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-2 "vegetable broth"@29:44 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "cilantro"@49:57 / FOOD )
		:gol ( tool-0-0 "a large saucepan"@63:79 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 1) Bring to a boil, and cook until the carrots are tender, about 10 minutes.
2) Remove from heat and allow to cool slightly.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "Remove"@3:9 / AC
		:source ( "heat"@15:19 / OTHER )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-2-1 "cool"@33:37 / AC )
)

content.text: 3) Puree the soup until smooth, using a blender or food processor.
